```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE)
library(intraday)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(reactable)
library(echarts4r)
```


# About this report

This report is done for open source and startup endorsement purposes.

```{r}
price_df_raw <- readr::read_csv(system.file("market-data/price_data.csv",package="intraday"))
```
```{r}
price_df = price_df_raw %>% select(-X1) %>% mutate(date=as_datetime(date,tz="Turkey")) %>% relocate(aof,.after=mcp)
```

# Prices Summary

```{r}
price_df %>% mutate(hour = hour(date)) %>% select(-smpDirection,-date) %>% tidyr::pivot_longer(-hour) %>% group_by(name) %>% e_chart(hour)  %>% e_line(value) %>% e_title("Price Formation Chart")
```


```{r}
reactable(price_df %>% arrange(date),defaultPageSize = 24,height = 270,
  striped = TRUE)
```
